text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor @NYGovCuomo Magic.
That was how the Coronavirus that has killed 108,000 Americans was going to go away according to you.

Odd that you no longer want to talk about the thousand Americans dying daily because of your incompetence.

Also "putting down" is what you do to sick dogs not people.
